segments.text: Oh, what a charming scene in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being sneaky, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is up on that stool, stretching so high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, all excited and waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how they're teaming up for this little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom is busy with the dishes, polishing that plate nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea what's going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's running from the sink, but it's kind of funny how unaware she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading, making the floor all shiny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks lovely with those bushes and the path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This reminds me of my own childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get a cookie or two before she turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a delightful moment to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
